about_the_game:
A simple Bullet Hell A-RPG game with some Cards in it

Your objective is to eliminate the Mother Entity, but to do so, you must face many difficult challenges before being ready to fight it, or you might get lucky and eliminate it without much effort...

Either ways; will defeating the Mother Entity actually be the end..?

You can switch your Spaceship Parts to create a build that suits your playstyle, and you can craft new better Parts, but they might not fit your playstyle, so you might have to grind a little.

You can also use Cards to further enhance your stats, but you'll have to figure out what Cards work with your build and what Cards don't, some Cards will even have some side effects, so you might consider trying a new playstyle with a new build with the Cards you decide to play with.

More systems, Cards and game mechanics will be added to the game in the future.

Either ways; will defeating the Mother Entity actually be the end..?

You can switch your Spaceship Parts to create a build that suits your playstyle, and you can craft new better Parts, but they might not fit your playstyle, so you might have to grind a little.

You can also use Cards to further enhance your stats, but you'll have to figure out what Cards work with your build and what Cards don't, some Cards will even have some side effects, so you might consider trying a new playstyle with a new build with the Cards you decide to play with.

name: Entities

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 190 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 190 MB available space

short_description: A simple Bullet Hell A-RPG game with some Cards in it. Your objective is to eliminate the Mother Entity, simple enough, right? Or is it..?
